message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.CC, cs.CR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with rate-optimal codes and derives upper bounds on their rates. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses codes with small availability and their properties. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is relevant as the paper focuses on locally repairable codes, which are important in distributed storage systems. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper discusses the complexity of constructing rate-optimal codes with small availability. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is less likely but still possible as locally repairable codes have applications in secure distributed storage systems.
